title: Directory implementation that uses ZIP
description:
Would is be possible to create an implementation of Directory that uses ZIP to 
compress the index into a single file, i.e. ZIPDirectory? This would help in 
distributing indices (with software) to be used on single workstations for read-
only purposes.

comments.content: The CompoundFile format pretty closely simulates this (although it uses 3 files, not 1).  At any rate, it should be sufficient.
comments.author: Grant Ingersoll
